title: 5 Ways ChatGPT Can Improve, Not Replace, Your Writing
description: Generate your own text—but get help from the AI bot to make it stand out.

title: Wild Donkeys Are on the Vanguard of Ukraine’s Ecological Recovery
description: Maybe one tweak: Ecologists in Ukraine are reintroducing kulans and other species to the steppes to help recover the war-ravaged ecoystem. It’s worked before—at Chernobyl.
